detail_desc: Down jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, small stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-high boots in imitation leather with a stretchy shaft, zip in one side, contrasting colour heel sections and toe sections in leather. Shaft lined in soft, lightly brushed jersey, leather insoles and chunky soles.
Fine-knit, knee-high football socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Shoulder bag in imitation leather divided into two compartments, each with a flap and magnetic fastener. Narrow metal chain shoulder strap with an imitation leather section over the shoulder. Lined. Size 4x13 cm.
Hat in felted fabric with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Set with a hat and pair of gloves in a soft fine knit. Hat with a fabric appliqué on the upturned hem. Gloves with ribbed cuffs.
Block-print T-shirt in cotton jersey.

Blouse in sturdy, transparent plumeti organza with a sheen. Deep opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and short, elasticated, raglan balloon sleeves. Seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at the back, and a flared peplum. Chiffon lining.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Joggers in soft cotton jersey with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top. Short, narrow shoulder straps, an opening with a tie at the back of the neck and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist with a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a kangaroo pocket, hood with embroidery and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a shirt and sweater vest in cotton. Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a detachable bow tie with a plastic fastener. V-neck sweater vest in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Jumper knitted in a wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide cardigan knitted in a soft alpaca blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and pockets with a button at the back. Adjustable elastic braces with imitation leather details that can be unbuttoned and removed.
Leg warmers in a soft rib knit with an opening for the heels. The polyester content of the leg warmers is recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Espadrilles in patterned cotton canvas with sequins, elastic gores and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle-length trousers in airy denim. High, elasticated waist with pleats and ties, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Patterned softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Side pockets, reflective details and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Calf-length dress in lace with short, scalloped cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined in a contrasting colour.

prod_name: MACY OTS DR V5 OR FLOUNCE
detail_desc: Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder dress in cotton jersey with covered elastication at the top and short sleeves.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress with a lace top and pleated skirt in woven fabric. Round neck, a seam at the waist with a lace frill trim and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Semi shiny tights with extra room for a growing tummy. Reinforced at the top. 20 denier.

prod_name: BEANIE KNIT CHUNKY FUR POM POM
detail_desc: Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a turned-up hem.
Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Captain's cap in a cotton weave with metal buttons at the sides and braiding at the front. Quilted lining.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a U-shaped decoration at the top, detachable strap at the back of the neck and a concealed silicone trim at the top.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side.

Handbag accessory with a metal chain and carabiner hook and imitation leather pendant in the shape of a backpack. The backpack has a zip at the top, faux fur pompom and small, zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 3x7x9 cm.
Wide top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and flounces at the sides.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and decorative buttons down the front.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with a sheen. Elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.
Long shirt in airy, printed crêpe with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with pleats at the top, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and tiers to the hem.
Ankle-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, long sleeves and concealed zip in one side. Seam with a tie belt at the waist and a slit at the front. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with elastication and a small frill at the waist and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Leggings in stretch washed denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Short, 4-pocket skirt in sturdy, washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button and a raw-edge, cut-off hem. Some of the cotton content of the skirt is recycled.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Oversized jumper in a wool knit with a V-neck front and back, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Straight, ribbed hem with slits in the sides and ribbed cuffs. Longer at the back.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with hole-embroidered sections, a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with gathers front and back, a frill over the shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit pointelle cardigan in a soft viscose blend with dropped shoulders, slits in the sides and no buttons. Ribbing at the cuffs, hem and along the side seams and front opening.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and asymmetric hem. Short inner skirt.
Socks in textured-knit cotton with rib-knit, fold-down shafts.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cotton jersey top with short double frills in woven fabric around the armholes.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a narrow, decorative frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Recycled polyester lining.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Trousers in soft slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless playsuit in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps and a deep neckline with decorative gathers front and back. Elasticated seam and ties at the waist, side pockets and short legs with frilled hems.

Short, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar with a concealed hood that has an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Wide, calf-length skirt in pleated imitation leather with a high waist and a concealed zip and covered press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets.

Dungarees in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with a three-part chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and front and back pockets. Fake fly, press-studs at the sides, jersey-lined legs and hems lined in a patterned weave.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a round neckline that has an opening and button at the back of the neck.

Hi-top trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fancy dress cape in jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck. Unlined.
V-neck nursing jumper in a soft, fine knit with an airy weave section at the hem and open sides with ties for easy nursing access.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) with embroidered text inside the waistband, a zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Dress in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a detachable tie belt and long sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons. Unlined.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
